crossref: { value of the message json field from api.crossref.org/works/10.0000/0000.0000.0000 }

download.timestamp: {unix timestamp, or date time string for papers downloaded earlier than 2016-11}
download.university: {university proxy used for download, absent for papers downloaded from simple proxies}
download.from: {country of the user who requested the paper, absent for early downloads and Sci-Hub's manual downloads}

sci-hub.image: {number of .img file containing the pdf (.img files are used by Sci-Hub to store files on mirrors}}

libgen.ID: {ID in scimag table corresponding to the file with the same DOI and MD5 sum}
